snippet.title: The Smurfs – Dreams – Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
🌟 Hop from dream to dream and help the Smurfs overcome their worst nightmares in The Smurfs - Dreams, available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Nintendo Switch in physical and digital edition, and on PC (Steam, GOG, Microsoft Store, Epic Game Store) and Xbox One|Series in digital edition on October 24th!
 
Wishlist on:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2602020/The_Smurfs__Dreams/
PlayStation:  https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10010426
EGS: https://store.epicgames.com/p/smurfs-dream-3e8f70
GOG : https://www.gog.com/en/game/the_smurfs_dreams

Alone or with a friend, discover enchanting locations and explore the dreams of your favorite Smurfs. Each dream is a unique adventure, with smurfingly exciting challenges and mind-boggling puzzles. Imagination comes to life in this fully immersive and magical 3D platformer.

Website: https://www.microids.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheSmurfsDreams
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/microids/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thesmurfsdreams/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thesmurfsdreams
